name: Amazon Shopping Tools
description: Save money and time with DontPayFull proprietary Amazon Shopping Tools. Get instant discounts up to 75% off and find hidden deals!

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https://geo.dpf.cloud https://*.doubleclick.net https://api.dontpayfull.com https://www.google-analytics.com
